sentences.english: "Yes, " the woman says, "You're checking for breast cancer."
sentences.chinese: “知道，”，美呂說，“你在檢查乳腺癌。”

sentences.english: P16 protein may serve as an important indicator of estimating prognosis of breast cancer.
sentences.chinese: P16可作爲臨牀上判定乳腺癌預後的一個新指標。

sentences.english: The effect of estrogens on fibrocystic breast disease (FBD) are controversial.
sentences.chinese: 雌激素對乳腺纖維囊性增生病的影響各家報道不一。

sentences.english: Surgical removal of a breast cyst is necessary only in a few unusual circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 只有在不得已的情況下才有必要做手術移除乳腺囊腫。

sentences.english: To investigate the diagnosis and treatment of breast phyllodes tumor.
sentences.chinese: 總結乳腺葉狀腫瘤的診治情況。

sentences.english: These indicated that the body was in the state of oxidative stress, especailly the mammary gland.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，患牛機體與乳腺組織處於氧化應激狀態。

sentences.english: Breast cancer is the second leading cause of cancer-related deaths among American women.
sentences.chinese: 乳腺癌是美國婦女癌症相關死因中列於第二位。

sentences.english: The histologic classification of breast carcinoma into duct and lobular type lacks the basis of histogenesis.
sentences.chinese: 乳腺癌分類爲導管癌和小葉癌缺少組織發生學依據。

sentences.english: The factor of breast density can predict a painful mammographic experience.
sentences.chinese: 乳腺密度是檢查過程中疼痛發生的一個提示因素。

sentences.english: But the mechanism of alcohol-induced breast cancer are poorly understood.
sentences.chinese: 但是酒精緻乳腺癌的機理尚不清楚。

sentences.english: Objective To study the antitumor effect of gemcitabine in chemotherapy with breast cancer.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討吉西他濱在乳腺癌化療中的作用。

sentences.english: Objective To analysis the diagnosis and therapy of cystosarcoma phyllodes of the breast (CSPB).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討乳腺葉狀囊肉瘤的診斷和治療方法。

sentences.english: Conclusion Treatment with little needle-knife has a satisfactory effect on mastoplasia.
sentences.chinese: 結論小針刀治療乳腺增生病療效滿意。

sentences.english: Mammary gland hyperplasia should be diagnosed circumspectly by ultrasound.
sentences.chinese: 超聲醫師對於“乳腺增生症”的診斷應謹慎。

sentences.english: The routine examination is hard to detect micrometastasis cell in peripheral blood of breast cancer.
sentences.chinese: 對於乳腺癌外周血微轉移，常規檢查難以發現。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical effect of neoadjuvant chemotherapy on advanced breast cancer .
sentences.chinese: 目的探討新輔助化療在晚期乳腺癌治療中的效果。

definition: growth (of organism)/proliferation/supernumerary candidate (in imperial examation system)
